amendment.description: To support supply chain innovation and multilateral security.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2422 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2422 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Rubio to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184; text: CR S4234-4235) To support supply chain innovation and multilateral security.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2422 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Rubio to Amendment SA 2301.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2422 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
